title: fslmn
author: fslmn
created_time: December 19, 2022, 01:15:35 PMLast edit: December 19, 2022, 02:36:30 PM by fslmn
content: Hi. I have discovered that electric transformer can convert AC to DC and DC back to AC.Looking for investors who are interested in experimenting with this unusual technique.It's not all, off course. I took universal motor, connected my way and it showed half of running current, at some point amper meter showed 0 amps produced by running motor. And more stuff.Also I feel like I can build powerfull PMDC generator, that can compete with 3 phase generators. PMDC generators are easier to build. Might not be particularly cheaper.But need to build custom cores, that don't look like any transformers today. And this cost money which I don't have. Need to buy material that is not cheap. Rent a place and get some not expensive equipment. I will place video cameras in the shop and setup life chat, so the investors would see what I'm doing.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: If you're looking for investors you might as well give information on how they can profit from your invention, might as well ask for donations that way there is no string attached to your invention, and I would like to ask, is there no science organization in your location that you can ask for funding, governments are funding unique and breakthrough inventions like this have you tried that first before asking for funding here, or check out companies that will likely benefit from your inventions ask them for audience and funding.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: fslmn on December 19, 2022, 01:15:35 PMHi. I have discovered that electric transformer can convert AC to DC and DC back to AC.That is not something new, I use a transformer to charge my car battery and plugin it to the AC current in my house...So what you can do by transforming the energy from AC to DC? i think the only application is to charge batteries but maybe I'm missing some important applications for it. And one last question, can you use this technology for mining, or what's the relation between your project and cryptos?

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Why not just buy a motor/generator to do this? They may be as efficient as it gets and if they're not it'll be easier and more efficient to improve individual parts than it would to build your own from scratch.As said above, you also need a reason this can be used and what you're aiming to make. You've not said how big the motor or generator your expect to make is? Could it be used to charge a phone battery? An electric car? A house?
